datoCmsKey.name: Grace Andrade Bowen
datoCmsKey.vocalRange: Mezzo Soprano with High Mixed Belt
datoCmsKey.danceExperience: Training in Tap, Jazz, and Ballet. A confident mover with a whole lot of charm!
datoCmsKey.bio:
Grace is a queer, proud Latinx, New York based actor.  She's an alumna of both AMDA NY and The Huntington Beach Academy of the Performing Arts.  She is currently the lead vocalist and voice over artist for Dewey Future Education Inc and plays Tricia in current workshops and performances of â€œA (Funny) Imagination"
Offstage, you can find her reading, exploring new restaurants with her partner, and drinking iced coffee all year round.
